original_text: You must stand around the king. Each man must hold his weapon in his hand. If anyone comes near to you, you must kill them. You must stay near to the king everywhere that he goes.’
korean_text: 너희는 각각 손에 무기를 잡고 왕을 호위하며 너희 대열을 침범하는 모든 자는 죽이고 왕이 출입할 때에 시위할지니라 하니

sentences.original_text: You must stand around the king
Each man must hold his weapon in his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 각 사람은 자기 무기를 손에 들어야 한다

sentences.original_text: If anyone comes near to you
You must stay near to the king
